name: Memorial Chrysalis
desc: For each stack of "Obsession" ally target has, ally target's Basic ATK and Skill DMG dealt increase by 6%. When an ally character departs from the field, is knocked down, or when an ally memosprite disappears, the character in position 1 in the current team obtains 50% of that ally's "Obsession" stacks and an equal amount of "Obsession" max limit. This additional stack limit will disappear after 2 turn(s).
